snippet: Vani Mehra was ready to buy a place of her own. She began apartment-hunting on the Lower East Side.
abstract: The Hunt column on the search by Vani Mehra for Manhattan apartment for under $400,000; found alcove studio in Chelsea for $355,000.
lead_paragraph: Vani Mehra was ready to buy a place of her own. She began apartment-hunting on the Lower East Side.

headline.print_headline: A Good Kitchen, on a First-Home Budget
